abstract: reds sign veteran righty to minor league deal .
article: after a pretty quiet offseason , the cincinnati reds have made one of their biggest moves this offseason tuesday with the signing of veteran pitcher vance worley . this is just a minor league deal right now , however given worley 's potential , he could figure to be a key part of the reds rotation next year . worley will receive an invitation to major league spring training . reds sign vance worley pic . twitter . com/qybal0onj1 -- mlb trade rumors january 9 , 2018 . worley struggled with the marlins last year , but he is just two years removed from pitching to a strong 3.53 era in 86.2 innings with baltimore .

his experience as a starter and coming out of the bullpen should give him a leg up on other pitchers competing for a spot on the reds major league roster next year . the #reds have signed rhp vance worley to a minor league contract with an invitation to major league spring training . pic . twitter . com/rbetfblpjz -- cincinnati reds january 9 , 2018 . worley has a serious chance to make the reds opening day roster , and we hope it happens if for no other reason than to see those spectacles back in the majors .
